content: adorable cat coasters and fun to make and cute to display note this is a listing for a downloadable pdf pattern to crochet your own adorable coasters note that yardage given is per coaster > please note that this pattern is > available for free on my blog here 1 > the benefit of purchasing this pdf is > an easy to read printable and > ad-free version of the pattern materials needed worsted weight cotton yarn crochet hook size g embroidery floss for facial features optional tapestry needle coaster measures approximately 4 25 x 4 25 pattern will be available for instant download upon payment the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of crochet 365 knit too this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not distribute or sell this pattern under any circumstances due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase 1 https //www crochet365knittoo com/cute-crochet-cat-coasters/
